about_the_game:
An alternate future after a global flood.
A young wanderer from the wasteland named Victor learns about the "city of dreams" in the northern mountains, where ancient technologies and an antediluvian way of life have survived. Deciding that he has nothing to lose, he goes on a risky trip to see it with his own eyes.
Having reached the city, he quickly realizes that the situation here is tense to the limit due to rampant crime and the disastrous financial situation of local residents who do not have the happiness of living behind a large fence separating the 'chosen ones' from the rest. The desire to find his place in the cradle of surviving humanity turns into a series of dizzying events, during which Victor will have to unravel the plans of the mysterious mayor and become a hero-liberator...


  • Unique post-flood setting and original atmosphere,
  • The author's story and interesting quests, uncovered the game world with different directions,
  • High game difficulty,
  • Elements of a survival sim and fishing mechanics,
  • Spacious locations in the middle of the waters and mountains, available for exploration,
  • The mysterious antagonist and the ending of the story that tears off all the veils.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes scenes of violence and blood.

short_description: Welcome to the future after the global flood. An exciting adventure awaits you as a young wanderer named Victor. Journey to the last city on Earth, whose fate rests solely in your hands. Defeat the elusive villain, destroy the sinister plans of the mysterious mayor, and become the liberating hero!
